caseTitle: Uzma Naveed Chaudhry & others v. Federation of Pakistan thr. its Secretary M/o Information, Broadcasting and National Heritage, Islamabad & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: (i) Objectives of the Protection against Harassment of Women at the Workplace Act 2010, highlighted (ii) Constitutional foundations of rights to ‘gender equality’ and ‘safe working environment’, explained (iii) meaning and scope of right to ‘dignity’, narrated (iv) Complaints against sexual harassment to be decided on merits irrespective of the delay in reporting the matter, emphasized.
